itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Lumberjack’s Rest Area, Longleaf Tree Forest, Oze Pass. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Cedar Trees.

item.name: Cedar Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Cedar Timber.

item.name: Trade Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Trade Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Thick Harpoon
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching deep sea fish. Some fish can only be caught with a harpoon. \n- It requires a Fishing Boat to use.

item.name: Thin Harpoon
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching deep sea fish. Some fish can only be caught with a harpoon. \n- It requires a Fishing Boat to use.

item.name: Ultimate Bares Longbow
item.desc:
A Bares Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Bares Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Longbow of Crimson Flame, Bares Longbow of Destruction, Bares Longbow of Temptation, Bares Longbow

item.name: Bares Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Bares Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Longbow of Temptation, Bares Longbow

item.name: Bares Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Longbow of Destruction, Bares Longbow

item.name: Bares Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Longbow of Crimson Flame, Bares Longbow

item.name: Bares Longbow
item.desc: A longbow possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Cedar Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Cedar Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Cedar Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Cedar Timber.

item.name: Krea Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Krea Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Longbow of Crimson Flame, Krea Longbow

item.name: Krea Longbow
item.desc: A longbow crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Ultimate Krea Longbow
item.desc:
A Krea Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Krea Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Longbow of Crimson Flame, Krea Longbow of Destruction, Krea Longbow of Temptation, Krea Longbow

item.name: Krea Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Krea Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Longbow of Temptation, Krea Longbow

item.name: Krea Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Krea Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Krea Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Longbow of Destruction, Krea Longbow
